feature_model.name: Line Trace Car
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Line Trace Car (f_Line_Trace_Car) :m Running a Course (f_Running_a_Course) :m Running a Normal Section (f_Running_a_Normal_Section) :m Running a Section (f_Running_a_Section) :o Running a Slope Section (f_Running_a_Slope_Section) :o Running a Twin Loop Section (f_Running_a_Twin_Loop_Section) :o Running a Seesaw Section (f_Running_a_Seesaw_Section) :g [1, *] : 2010 Inner Course (f_2010_Inner_Course) : 2010 Outer Course (f_2010_Outer_Course) : 2009 Outer Course (f_2009_Outer_Course) : 2009 Inner Course (f_2009_Inner_Course)
